jdbcService.sql: update node_audits set modified = case when :modified is null then modified else :modified end, actor_id = case when :actorId is null then actor_id else :actorId end, description = case when :description is null then description else :description end, device_id = case when :deviceId is null then device_id else :deviceId end, host = case when :host is null then host else :host end, error_code = case when :errorCode is null then error_code else :errorCode end, error_log = case when :errorLog is null then error_log else :errorLog end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, action_id = case when :actionId is null then action_id else :actionId end, audit_level_id = case when :auditLevelId is null then audit_level_id else :auditLevelId end, node_id = case when :nodeId is null then node_id else :nodeId end where id = :id
